title: Pre-Code Horror | Maniac (1934) Bill Woods, Horace B. Carpenter | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Pre-Code Horror | Maniac (1934) Bill Woods, Horace B. Carpenter | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
What Are the Dangers of Desire?
An ex-vaudeville actor is working as the assistant to a doctor who has Frankenstein aspirations. The ex-vaudeville actor kills the doctor and decides to assume the identity of the dead physician.

Original title: Maniac (1934) AKA: Dwain Esper's Maniac

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/1bmru6Le9sU


Director: Dwain Esper
Writer: Hildegarde Stadie
Stars: Bill Woods, Horace B. Carpenter, Ted Edwards
Genres: Colorized classics, Horror, Sci-Fi
Budget: $5,000


00:00 Full Movie
01:59 Man conducts eerie experiment in a morgue, involving a stolen corpse and impersonation of an investigator.
11:00 Disturbing events unfold as a man becomes obsessed with reviving a heart and taking a life.
17:29 Unethical experiments lead to disastrous consequences in a man's quest for revival.
28:41 Mysterious experiments involving cats, mice, and a mad scientist unfold in a neighborhood, leading to strange occurrences.
36:16 Ridiculous banter and gossip about a failed actor's misfortune in a newspaper.
39:33 Suspense and danger unfold as characters plot against each other in a psychological thriller.
44:44 Disturbing events unfold in a psychiatric facility, leading to chaos and revelation of a sinister plot.


@CultCinemaClassics
